Name: Isle of Capri Casinos
Description: DELISTED - Isle of Capri Casinos, Inc. is a developer, owner and operator of branded gaming facilities and related lodging and entertainment facilities in regional markets in the United States. The Company owns and operates 15 gaming and entertainment facilities in Louisiana, Mississippi, Missouri, Iowa, Colorado and Florida. These properties feature approximately 15,000 slot machines and over 370 table games (including approximately 110 poker tables) over 3,000 hotel rooms and more than 40 restaurants. It also operates a harness racing track at its casino in Florida. The Company's wholly owned subsidiaries own and operate 14 casino gaming facilities in the United States located in Black Hawk, Colorado; Lake Charles, Louisiana; Lula, Biloxi, Natchez and Vicksburg, Mississippi; Kansas City, Caruthersville and Boonville, Missouri; Bettendorf, Davenport, Waterloo and Marquette, Iowa; and Pompano Beach, Florida. On November 29, 2012, the it sold Biloxi, Miss. Property to Golden Nugget Biloxi Inc.
